name: alexa
description: These projects are skills which I have written for Amazon's virtual assistant, Alexa. Currently they are all written in PHP and are hosted on my api subdomain. All of these skills and a few more are publically available to install from the Amazon Alexa app or Amazon website.

name: angular
description: I originally picked up Angular along with Typescript during my placement year, since then I've used it for mobile apps, websites, and desktop applications.

name: csharp
description: Having used it for over 5 years, C# is the language that I have the most experience with. For the majority of the time I have been using it to create Windows Desktop applications using WPF. More recently I have been developing APIs using ASP.NET Core.

name: java
description: I originally picked up Java as a part of my university studies. Since then I've used it in industry during my placement year.

name: mongodb
description: These projects all use MongoDB for storing data, typically using the Mongoose Node.js library.

name: node
description: The projects are witten using Node.JS. They might be client or server-side but will generally be written in Tyescript.

name: nuget
description: The projects are C# libraries which I have developed and are publically available on NuGet.org.

name: php
description: All of my PHP knowledge is self-taught. I have used it mostly to create small APIs which are typically ono more than a couple of files. In the future I will be looking to develop similar things using Node and Typescript.

name: typescript
description: I originally picked up Typescript during my placement year, since then I've used it for mobile apps, websites, APIs, desktop applications, and standalone libraries.

name: unity
description: These projects have been developed in the Unity Game Engine using C#.

name: wpf
description: I've been developing C#/WPF applications since the beginning of my college course and have continued to do so in my free time during university. The projects you can see below are only from the last year or so, as my skillset as been improving rapidly.
